entry.title: Los Angeles Candle
entry.summary:
Vendor: P.F. Candle Co.
Type: Candles
Price: 11.00 - 18.00 (2 variants)

As complex and rebellious as its hometown, Los Angeles wraps a warm, woody base with night blooming jasmine, unfolding a luxe fragrance with earthy undertones. Rejuvenating notes of sea salt, coastal sage, and deeply herbacious yarrow reveal a magnetic heart.

Top: Night Blooming Jasmine, Dry Desert Air, Lime

Heart: Sea Salt, Coastal Sage, Yarrow

Base: Redwood, Sea Salt, Beachwood

• Hand poured in the USA into apothecary-inspired amber jars

• 100% natural soy wax, phthalate-free premium fragrance oil, cotton wick

• Burn Time (7.2 oz): 40-50 hours | Burn Time (3.5 oz): 20-25 hours

• Sizes: 7.2 oz, 2.75" x 3.75"

Ingredients

100% natural soy wax, phthalate-free premium fragrance oil, cotton wick

Directions

Never leave candle burning unattended. Always trim your wick to 1/4" before each lighting.

entry.title: Dude No. 1 Cologne
entry.summary:
Vendor: MCMC
Type: Cologne
Price: 75.00

VIRGINIA CEDARWOOD / PINK PEPPER / SANDALWOOD / MOROCCAN ROSE / GINGER

Based on MCMC's wildly popular beard oil, this fragrance is the new classic manly scent that will make you want to get close. A blend of three woods - Virginia cedarwood, creamy sandalwood and smoky Haitian vetiver - accented by spicy ginger and pink peppercorn with a heart of Moroccan rose.

• Paraben free, Sulfate free, Phthalate free

• Never tested on animals

• 1 fl oz | 30 ml

Ingredients

Denatured Alcohol, Essential Oils & Absolutes, Fragrance, Distilled Water

Directions

entry.title: Kept Perfume Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: MCMC
Type: Perfume
Price: 45.00

RED ROSES / BLACK TEA / LEATHER / CLOVE

Kept is romantic with hints of rock n’ roll. Turning the notion of a kept woman on its head, the fragrance encourages women to look to themselves to evoke love. The long-lasting fragrance is built around red roses and black tea, with subtle notes of clove, leather, and amber.

• Paraben free, Sulfate free, Phthalate free

• Never tested on animals

• 9 ml rollerball

Ingredients

Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Essential Oils & Absolutes, Fragrance

Directions

entry.title: Maui Perfume Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: MCMC
Type: Perfume
Price: 45.00

YOUNG GINGER / STAR ANISE / FRANGIPANI / TUBEROSE / GREEN BAMBOO

Inspired by the namesake Hawaiian island where ancient traditions mingle with modern surf culture. With top notes of young ginger and star anise and a heart of frangipani, tuberose, and green bamboo all wrapped in a light salty breeze, Maui is the essence of freedom with a laid-back vibe.

• Paraben free, Sulfate free, Phthalate free

• Never tested on animals

• 9 ml rollerball

Ingredients

Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Essential Oils & Absolutes, Fragrance

Directions

entry.title: Love Perfume Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: MCMC
Type: Perfume
Price: 45.00

YUZU CITRUS / FRENCH BASIL / MAGNOLIA / TEMPLEWOOD

- From MCMC -

"The first time I fell in love, it was all fireworks and sparks and a rush of crazy dancing. The second time I fell in love, it was in a field by the ocean. My love is infinite. Japanese yuzu citrus, French sweet basil and Magnolia flower blend gently with ancient templewood and gunpowder. The scent lasts forever, just like true love."

• Paraben free, Sulfate free, Phthalate free

• Never tested on animals

• 9 ml rollerball

Ingredients

Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Essential Oils & Absolutes, Fragrance

Directions

entry.title: No. 11: Amber & Moss Eau de Parfum
entry.summary:
Vendor: P.F. Candle Co.
Type: Perfume
Price: 48.00

Mossy and clean at the start, this fragrance's base of musk + amber evokes a damp, wooded forest floor layered with soft oakmoss. A hint of lavender and an infusion of sage + orange lend to this scent's brightness.

Introducing P.F. Candle Co.'s unisex eau de parfum collection of subtle, intimate fine fragrances to accompany your everyday.

Top: Moss, Lavender

Heart: Sage, Lavandin, Orange

Base: Amber, Musk

• 1.7 fl oz / 50 mL

Ingredients

Alcohol denatured, parfum (fragrance), aqua (water).

Directions

entry.title: Sleep Welle Calming Mist
entry.summary:
Vendor: WelleCo
Type: Linen Spray
Price: 35.00

Lavender essential oil mist for Deep Sleeps. For Calming Nerves. For Composure. For Creating A Sense Of Peace.

A few spritz of The Sleep Welle Calming Mist and you surround your self and your space with a gentle aromatherapy mist. Use as part of your bedtime routine and drift away to the soothing fragrance of lavender on your pillow. The aromas will help reduce tension and anxiety and encourage a beautiful sleep on Cloud Nine. We also love using it in-flight and take it with us when staying in hotels. We actually can’t live without this!

• Made in Australia

• 3.3 oz / 100 ml

Ingredients

Water, Polysorbate, Lavender Hybrida, Fragrance, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl alcohol, Chamomile Recutita (Matricaria) flower extract, Linalool, D-Limonene, Geraniol.

Directions

Use as part of your bedtime routine and drift away to the soothing fragrance of lavender on your pillow. The aromas will help reduce tension and anxiety and encourage a beautiful sleep on Cloud Nine. We also love using it in-flight and take it with us when staying in hotels.

entry.title: DedCool Collection Sample Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: DedCool
Type: Perfume
Price: 25.00

Sample Pack Includes: Mini Sprays of Fragrances 01 x 02 x 03 x 04 x 05

01 "Taunt" Notes: Top: Bergamot, Fresh Dew. Middle:Floral, Cassis. Bottom: Vanilla, Amber

02 Notes: Top: Juniper. Middle: Green Floral, Sheer woods, Patchouli. Bottom: Sandalwood

03 "Blonde" Notes: Top: Juniper Berries, Pomelo, Saffron. Middle: Accord Cuir, Black Violet, Cristal Rose. Bottom: Blonde Woods, Raspberry, Vetiver

04 Notes: Top: Fig, Pepper. Middle: Orange, Lemon. Bottom: Sandalwood, Patchouli

05 "Spring" Notes: Top: Bergamot, Cardamom, Star Anise. Middle: Geranium, Incense, Lavender. Bottom: Moss, Patchouli, Vetiver

• Unisex, Vegan, Cruelty-free

Ingredients

Please refer to individual fragrance pages for more detailed ingredient information.

Directions

CAUTION: Flammable. Keep Away From Flame or Heat. For External Use Only. Keep Out of Reach of Children.

entry.title: Roll-On 05 "Spring"
entry.summary:
Vendor: DedCool
Type: Perfume
Price: 40.00

Notes:

Top: Bergamot, Cedar, Star Anise

Middle: Geranium, Incense, Lemon

Bottom: Oak Moss, Patchouli, Vetiver

• Unisex, Vegan, Cruelty-free

entry.title: No. 31: Cannabis Diffuser
entry.summary:
Vendor: P.F. Candle Co.
Type: Diffusers
Price: 22.00

This heady fragrance celebrates California's 2018 legalization of P.F. Candle Co's favorite herb. Sultry base notes of sweet balsamic, leather, and vetiver harmonize with fragrant patchouli, piquant rhubarb, and uplifting lemon to create a uniquely elevating experience that soothes the mind. The fragrance doesn't contain the real deal, but the blend of notes still takes us into the zone.

Top: Spiced Cloves, Lemon, Cannabis Flower

Heart: Rhubarb, Patchouli

Base: Sweet Balsamic, Leather, Vetiver

• Low maintenance + long lasting home fragrance

• Naturally harvested rattan reeds absorb the scented oil, releasing it slowly through your surroundings

• Lasts 2-3 months; flip reeds every 1-2 weeks

• Size: 4.25" in height, reeds are 10" long

Ingredients

Directions

Do not consume and keep away from children or pets. If the oil spills, clean up immediately.

entry.title: No. 30: Irish Whiskey Diffuser
entry.summary:
Vendor: P.F. Candle Co.
Type: Diffusers
Price: 22.00

P.F. Candle Co.'s ode to a barrel-aged, fine grain classic. Rich top notes of pear, honey and whiskey are wrapped in a warm base of vanilla and tonka. Robust and layered, this Jameson-inspired scent recalls all the good times - at least the ones we can remember.

Top: Pear, Honey, Whiskey

Heart: Cedarwood, Smoldering Cypress, Patchouli

Base: Vanilla, Tonka

• Low maintenance + long lasting home fragrance

• Naturally harvested rattan reeds absorb the scented oil, releasing it slowly through your surroundings

• Lasts 2-3 months; flip reeds every 1-2 weeks

• Size: 4.25" in height, reeds are 10" long

Ingredients

Directions

Do not consume and keep away from children or pets. If the oil spills, clean up immediately.

Type: Room Spray
Price: 10.00

Sultry base notes of sweet balsamic, leather, and vetiver harmonize with fragrant patchouli, piquant rhubarb, and uplifting lemon to create a uniquely elevating experience that soothes the mind. Top: Spiced Cloves, Lemon, Cannabis Flower

Heart: Rhubarb, Patchouli

Base: Sweet Balsamic, Leather, Vetiver

• Travel-friendly and perfect for creating a relaxing environment at home or away

• Can be used on linens, furniture, apparel, and more!

• Lasts 1-3 months (approximately 350 pumps)

• 2 fl oz

Ingredients

Mt. Shasta spring water, phthalate-free premium fragrance oil

Directions

Can be used on linens, furniture, apparel, and more!
